SEARCH
Package com.financial.ui

Class Theme

java.lang.Object
com.financial.ui.Theme
public final class Theme extends Object
Centralized theme constants for the FinDet application. Design Philosophy: - Apple-like minimalism with clean, spacious layouts - Greek governmental theming with subtle blue accents (inspired by Greek flag) - Gamified elements for engagement without overwhelming colors - Dark mode optimized for extended use
